text: “You must not let anyone define your limits because of where you come from. Your only limit is your soul.” – Ratatouille
It’s a small world after all.
“Our fate lives within us. You only have to be brave enough to see it.” – Brave
“Being brave doesn’t mean you go looking for trouble.” – Mufasa
You’re never too old to wish upon a star.
“I’d rather die today than live 100 years without knowing you.” – Pocahontas
Leave a little magic wherever you go.
“I can show you the world…” – Aladdin
“I‘ll make a man out of you.” – Mulan
“Laughter is timeless, imagination has no age, and dreams are forever.” –  Walt Disney
I am the princess of my own Fairy Tale.
“This is love. You’re not gonna find another girl like her in a million years. Believe me, I know. I’ve looked.” –  Aladdin
“If there ever comes a day when we can’t be together, keep me in your heart. I’ll stay there forever.” – Winnie the Pooh
“That’s the real trouble with the world, too many people grow up.” — Walt Disney
“Off to Neverland” – Peter Pan
I am not trying to give an image of a fairy-tale, perfect, everything else, I am just being myself.
“To infinity and beyond!” – Buzz Lightyear, Toy Story
“I never look back, darling, it distracts from the now.” – Edna Mode, The Incredibles
“At last I see the light.” – Tangled
“I look at you, and I’m home.” -Dory, Finding Nemo
“May the force be with you.” – Buzz Lightyear, Toy Story
“Tale as old as time.” – Beauty and the Beast
“You look beautiful-er!”- Anna, Frozen
“Reach for the sky!” – Woody, Toy Story
“There’s just no telling how far (insert name) will go.” – Moana
“Let me share this whole new world with you.”- Aladdin
“Ohana means family. And family means no one gets left behind.” – Lilo and Stitch
“We’re Soarin’, flying, there’s not a star in heaven that we can’t reach.” – High School Musical
“Just keep swimming.” – Dory, Finding Nemo
“Adventure is out there!” – Ellie, Up
“A good soldier never leaves a man behind!” – Sarge
“You’ve got a friend in me.” – Toy Story
“There’s a great big beautiful tomorrow waiting at the end of every day.” – Carousel of Progress
“Some people are worth melting for.” – Olaf, Frozen
“The dreams that you wish will come true.” – Cinderella
“Go, live your dream.” – Ruffian, Tangled
“It all started with a mouse.” – Walt Disney
“When you wish upon a star your dreams come true.” – Jiminy Cricket
Cinderella never asked for a prince.
“The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.” – Lee Iacocca
Always better together.
“Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family: Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.” – Jane Howard
Together we make a family.
A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
Everyone needs a house to live in, but a supportive family is what builds a home.
“A happy family is but an earlier heaven.” – George Bernard Shaw
Every family has a story. Welcome to ours!
“Being part of a family means smiling for photos.” – Harry Morgan
The truest form of best friendship is the friendship between a mom and her daughter.
Mom: Why is everything on the floor? Me: Gravity!
A family gives you the roots to stand tall and strong.
“Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.” – George Burns
A hug from family lasts a lifetime.
“Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing.” – Irina Shayk
Family is where life begins and love never ends.
It’s not what we have in life but who we have in our life that matters.
We may not have it all together, but together we have it all.
If you want to bring happiness into the world, go home, and love your family.
My family is just the right mix of chaos and love.
Families are like fudge – mostly sweet with a few nuts.
Happiness is only real when it’s shared. As long as you have a family. You have the means to share.
You don’t choose your family. They are God’s gift to you, as you are to them.
You call it chaos. We call it a family.
The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
The love of a family makes life beautiful.
Home is where the heart is.
No family is perfect, we argue, we fight. We even stop talking to each other at a time. But in the end, a family is family, the love will always be there.
My everything in one picture!
Family is not an important thing. It’s everything.
I have a hero and his name is Daddy.
Family, like branches on a tree. We all grow in different directions yet our roots remain as one.
I shook my family tree and a bunch of nuts fell out.
Shopping is my cardio.
“On Wednesdays, we wear pink.” – Karen Smith
“I want people to see the dress, but focus on the woman.” – Vera Wang
“In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.” — Coco Chanel
“People will stare. Make it worth their while.” — Harry Winston
As beautiful on the inside as I am on the outside.
I’m just saying you could do better.
Make them stop and stare.
A girl should be like a butterfly. Pretty to see, hard to catch.
A great girl is classy, not trashy
A real girl isn’t perfect and a perfect girl isn’t real.
Be a stiletto in a room full of flats.
All I need is Coffee and Mascara.
Born to express, not to impress.
“The dress must follow the body of a woman, not the body following the shape of the dress.” — Hubert de Givenchy
“Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.” — Marc Jacobs
“You can have anything you want in life if you dress for it.” — Edith Head
“Don’t be into trends. Don’t make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress, and the way to live.” — Gianni Versace
“Nothing makes a woman more beautiful than the belief that she is beautiful.” – Sophia Loren
“Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.” – Coco Chanel
“You are imperfect, permanently, and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful.” – Amy Bloom
I’ve never seen a smiling face that was not beautiful.
But first, lipstick.
Confidence level: Kanye West.
Curls run the world.
Do you like this dress?
Don’t be like the rest of them, darling.
Don’t be so quick to judge me. After all, You only see what I choose to show you.
Even the most beautiful women will have at least some insecurity, whether they admit it or not.
Girls are like abstract paintings. Even though you can’t understand them, they’re still beautiful.
Give a girl the right Hairstyle and she will conquer the world.
I am a crafty girl, I make things, lots of things.
“Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.” – Anne Frank
You’re not fully dressed until you sparkle.
You don’t have to be rich, to sparkle.
You are looking gorgeous today just like every other day.
When in doubt, wear red lipstick.
What do you think of this look?
Unlike Barbies, I and my girls aren’t sold separately.
Today’s perfect.
Time for a change.
This is the most magical pic of your life.
There’s a girl out there with love in her eyes and flowers in her hair.
The Master of Disguise.
The happiest girls always have the prettiest nails.
Stress does not go with my outfit!
Sometimes you gotta be a beauty and a beast!
I don’t sweat—I sparkle.
Some people confuse crazy with passion. Let me be clear, I’m bat shit passionate!
So many nail polishes, not enough fingers.
Slay them with sweetness.
I did NOT wake up like this.
Some girls are just born with glitter in their veins.
I know I am Awesome, so I don’t care about your opinion.
I’m a queen crowned in my curls.
I’m an odd combination of “REALLY SWEET” and “DON’T MESS WITH ME”!
If you’re going to be two-faced, at least make one of them pretty.
Isn’t it beautiful outside?
It doesn’t matter what anyone else thinks of me because I know who I am, and I am damn proud of it.
It’s okay to be a glow stick; sometimes we need to break before we shine.
Just like my eyeliner, I always wing it.
Short hair, don’t care.
Shopping is cheaper than therapy.
Out of the way, world. I’ve got my sassy pants on today.
My kind of makeup.
My daily routine: Get up, be brilliant, go back to bed, repeat!
Money can’t buy happiness… But it can buy makeup!
Me? Weird? B*tch Please! I am a Limited Edition.
Look at me enjoying my life while there 1 million assignments due for college.
Like me or hate me, I’d still be this pretty.
Life isn’t perfect but your outfit can be.
Life is too short for boring hair.
Leave a little sparkle everywhere you go.
Keep smiling because life is a beautiful thing and there’s so much to smile about.
How can I go on a diet? The fridge is still full!
Money won’t be able to buy happiness, but it can get you this delicious meal instead.
Let’s gain some weight!
Coffee can’t solve everything but it can solve a lot.
Note to self: “Eyes on the fries!”
I have hunger management issues.
Chocolate doesn’t ask silly questions, chocolate understands – just like best friends!
I love Instagram because it allows me to maintain a record of every meal I partake.
All things are possible with coffee and a cute outfit.
I’m on a 30-day diet. So far, I’ve lost 15 days.
Good food, good mood.
I’m so eggcited to eat!
Another one bites the crust.
Food shared is happiness multiplied.
There is no better reward for hard work than good food.
Coffee and confidence and camera.
The chief ingredient in yummy food is love.
A little slice of heaven.
Carbs might be my soulmate.
Yup, another food pic.
Wine + dinner = winner
Education is okay and all, but have you tried free pizza?
When life gives you lemons, make lemonade.
Eat, drink, and be cozy.
We go together like cupcakes and frosting.
Today is a good day for cake.
There’s no “we” in fries.
Friends buy you food. Best friends eat your food.
There is nothing better than a good friend, except for a good friend with chocolate.
The perfect blend!
Ramen is my new gourmet. Forget MasterChef.
Oh pizza, you understand me so well.
My hobbies include eating and complaining that I’m getting fat.
May your coffee be hot and your eyeliner even.
Life is like a box of chocolate; sometimes you just dig out the good center parts and leave all the undesirable rest to waste.
If I can start a day with you, I would never think of having a coffee.
Give me the chocolate and nobody gets hurt
I’m on a seafood diet. When I see food, I eat it.
How do you reward yourself after a long day?
I love the way we look together – as sweet as sugar and as nice as ice.
How do I feel when there is no coffee? Depresso.
I like hashtags because they look like waffles.
Be a beautiful cupcake in a world full of muffins.
I like foodies.
Hello Starbucks? Can I have a mocha good luck, please?
“Twenty-four-hour champagne diet”
I followed a diet but it didn’t follow me back, so I unfollowed it.
Salty but sweet.
License to chill.
Let’s celebrate with a toast and get lost in tonight.
All I want to do is taco’ about you.
Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite.
I still get butterflies even though I’ve seen you a hundred times.
One smile can’t change the world, but your smile changes mine.
I want to be with you until my last page.
Good friends will share the umbrella. Best friends will steal it and yell: Run loser Run!
That awkward moment when your crush asks you who is your crush.
I want you. All of you. Your Flaws. Also your mistakes. And your imperfections. I want you, and only you.
Friends are the most important ingredients in the recipe of life.
I’ll never finish falling in love with you.
Together is a wonderful place to be.
Friends don’t let you do stupid things… alone!
If I could have anyone in the world it would still be you.
You make my heart skip a beat.
Best friends: they know how crazy you are and still choose to be seen with you in public.
What I have with you I don’t want with anyone else.
Always wear cute pajamas to bed, you’ll never know who u will meet in your dreams.
When we’re together, hours feel like seconds. When we’re apart, days feel like years.
You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
You’re my favorite place to go when my mind searches for peace.
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
Everyone has that one annoying friend if you don’t have one then it’s probably you.
Anyone can catch your eye, but it takes someone special to catch your heart.
Follow your heart in everything you do.
Friendship: When a friend calls you in the middle of the night to tell you “Get ready, I will pick you up in 30 minutes!”, and you only reply “done!”
Anywhere with you is better than anywhere without you.
Baby, I all need is you.
Friends who slay together, stay together.
If I have to clean my house before you come over, then we’re not real friends.
Being single is smarter than being in the wrong relationship.
Can I borrow a kiss? I promise I will give it back.
Best friends have all the therapy you need.
Every day I spend with you, becomes the best day of my life.
Friends are the family we chose.
I am absolutely, definitely, positively, unquestionably, beyond any doubt, in love with you.
Hard times will always reveal true friends.
I’ve fallen in love many times… but always with you.
Friends pick us up when we fall down and if they can’t, they lie down with us and listen for a while.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
I could spend hours looking at you and your smile.
Best Friends make good times better and hard times easier!
I want to be your favorite hello and your hardest goodbye.
Falling in love all over again.
In squad we trust.
Every time I see you, I fall in love all over again.
I feel the fragrance of LOVE everywhere when you are near me.
I am happiest when I’m right next to you.
Facebook keeps asking me what’s on my mind? and honestly its always you.
I don’t know what’s tighter, our jeans or our friendship!
Everyone has an addiction, mine happens to be you.
I don’t like to commit myself about heaven and hell-you see, I have friends in both places.
Friends make this world beautiful.
I am trying not to think about you but it’s not working.
Together we are complete.
I always wake up smiling… I think it’s your fault.
Find your tribe. Love them hard.
Individually, we are one drop. Together we are an ocean.
Learn to appreciate the people who want to be in your life and stop stressing over people who don’t want to be in your life.
Love doesn’t need to be perfect, it just needs to be true.
Marriage is a workshop..where husband works & wife shops… It’s shopping time!
Meet my partner in crime.
My dream wouldn’t be complete without you in it.
She is my Best Friend. You break her heart, I will break your face.
Sometimes I look at you and I wonder how I got to be so damn lucky.
Thank you for reminding me what butterflies feel like.
True friends never apart. Maybe in distance, but never in heart.
You are the risk I’ll always take.
That awkward moment when you’re wearing Nike’s and you can’t do it.
If we’re not meant to have midnight snacks, why is there a light in the fridge?
My prince is not coming on a white horse… he’s obviously riding a turtle somewhere, really confused.
I want to be like a caterpillar. Eat a lot. Sleep for a while. Wake up beautiful.
Zombies are real, just come to my school.
You never know what you have until you have cleaned your house.
Lies I tell myself: Just one more cookie. Just one more movie. Just one more minute. Yet… I wouldn’t call them lies!
Whenever I have a problem, I sing. Then I realize my voice is worse than my problem.
You couldn’t handle me even if I came with instructions.
Even I don’t believe myself when I say I’ll be ready in five minutes.
When nothing goes right, go left instead!
Maybe if we tell people the brain is an app, they will start using it.
The hardest thing I ever tried was being normal.
Weekend, please don’t leave me.
My mother told me not to talk to strangers. I never talk to myself anymore.
I used to have superpowers but the psychiatrist took them away.
They say don’t try this at home… so I went to my friend’s home!
I don’t care what people think of me. Mosquitos find me attractive!
Sorry, I’m late, I didn’t want to come.
Is Google a boy or a girl? Obviously, a girl because it won’t let you finish your sentence without suggesting other ideas.
My hairstyle is called “I Tried”.
I’m in desperate need of a 6-month vacation… twice a year.
There may be no excuse for laziness, but I’m still looking.
I don’t always make sense, but when I do, I don’t.
Reality called, so I hung up.
If there would be an award for being lazy, I would send someone to pick it up for me.
The ugly selfie you deleted is the real you. Accept it!
I put the “Pro” in procrastination.
Sure, I do marathons. On Netflix.
Normal? Normal is only the people you do not know well enough.
Need an ark? I Noah guy.
I just wanna spend the rest of my life laughing.
My craziness is not everyone’s cup of tea.
If I was funny, I would have a good Instagram caption.
I’m not crazy I prefer the term mentally hilarious.
Dear sleep: thanks for trying, but you can’t beat surfing the net.
Boys and girls are like parking spaces. All the good ones are taken.
A cop pulled me over and told me “Papers”, so I said “Scissors, I win!” and drove off.
What do you call a snowman in the summer? A puddle.
Sure, I do marathons. On Netflix.
“Happiness is a warm puppy.” — Charles M. Schulz
Dogs are my favorite people.
“A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.” — Josh Billings
The journey of life is sweeter when traveled with a dog.
“Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.” – Kinky Friedman
I wonder what my dog named me.
Life is too short to just have one dog.
“You can usually tell that a man is good if he has a dog who loves him.” – W. Bruce Cameron
My therapist has four legs and a tail.
“It is amazing how much love and laughter they bring into our lives and even how much closer we become with each other because of them.” – John Grogan
First, he stole my heart, then he stole my bed.
“You know, a dog can snap you out of any kind of bad mood that you’re in faster than you can think of.” – Jill Abramson
Dog people are my kinda people.
“Such short little lives our pets have to spend with us, and they spend most of it waiting for us to come home each day.” – John Grogan
Life would be ruff without you.
“Dogs do speak, but only to those who know how to listen.”– Orhan Pamuk
You had me at woof.
I will always woof you.
Your pet is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.
“Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.” – Roger Caras
All my kids have paws.
First, they steal your heart, then they steal your bed.
It really is the dog’s house, we just pay the bills.
“Happiness is a warm puppy.” – Charles Shultz
I work hard so my dog can have nice things.
Dog kisses fix everything.
“If you want a friend, buy a dog.” – Kevin O’Leary
Life is better with a dog.
You can always find hope in pet eyes.
“If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went.” – Will Rogers
Stay pawsititve.
“Every puppy should have a boy.” – Erma Bombeck
Yes, I like dogs better than most people. So bite me.
What a beauty it would be if people had hearts like dogs.
The road to my heart is paved with paw prints.
“The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.” – Andy Rooney
Happiness starts with a wet nose and ends with a tail.
Dogs have paw prints on our hearts.
“The poor dog, in life the firmest friend. The first to welcome, foremost to defend.” – Lord Byron
Do I believe in love at first sight? Of course, I fall in love with every dog I see.
All you need is love & a dog.
“Actually, my dog I think is the only person who consistently loves me all the time.” – H. G. Bissinger
The journey of life is sweeter when traveled with your favorite pet.
Pets fur is just part of the decor of this house.
Love is a four-legged word.
“I don’t understand people who don’t touch their pets. Their cat or dog is called a pet for a reason.” – Jarod Kintz
“Anybody who doesn’t know what soap tastes like never washed a dog.” – Franklin P. Jones
Life is too short to just have one dog.
It’s impossible to forget a pet that gave you so much to remember.
Having a dog will bless you with the happiest days of your life, and one of the worst days.
“A boy can learn a lot from a dog: obedience, loyalty, and the importance of turning around three times before lying down.” – Robert Benchley
Better an Oops, than a what if.
Sometimes relationships end so love stories can begin.
Pursue your passion and you’ll never work a day in your life.
Say yes, take risks, and live life on your own terms.

You can regret a lot of things but you’ll never regret being kind.
Look for the magic in every moment.
You can’t break this girl.
Life is about taking chances and having fun.
Smiling and dreaming won’t cost money. So, I expertise in both of them.
Even the stars were jealous of the sparkle in her eyes.
It’s just a bad day. Not a bad life.
Life is better when you’re laughing.
The only person you should try to be better than is the one you were yesterday.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
Throwback to those days when life was less terrible.
Stay strong. Make them wonder why you are still smiling.
Take every chance you get in life because some things only happen once.
So much to be thankful for.
The best mistake to never repeat is to never cry for the same problem twice.
You know you are happy when you catch yourself smiling even when no one is around.
When nothing goes right, go left.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
They told me I couldn’t that’s why I did.
Smile today, tomorrow could be worse.
Life is only as legendary as you make it.
People will judge you without knowing who you are, people will wish you bad things without knowing your story, but you don’t have to listen to them. They are not better than you.
Only dead fish go with the flow.
It may hurt a lot now, but I’m strong enough to handle it.
Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
Not everyone likes us. But not everyone matters.
I’m thankful for the struggles that made me the person I am today.
Mistakes are proof that you’ve tried.
I know the voices in my head aren’t real… but sometimes their ideas are just absolutely awesome!
Make them stop and stare.
Lives change like the weather. I hope you remember today is never too late to be brand new.
Life is too short for bad vibes.
Don’t let anyone tell you that you’re not strong enough.
It may hurt a lot now, but I’m strong enough to handle it.
Hating me doesn’t make you pretty.
Create your own happiness.
If you are always trying to be normal, you will never know how amazing you can be.
Good vibes only.
Be patient and tough; someday this pain will be useful to you.
Filling my mind with happy thoughts.
Get busy living or get busy dying.
The future’s so bright we need shades.
Don’t take life too seriously. Nobody gets out alive.
Be who and what you want, period.
It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
Don’t live a life regretting the things you didn’t do. Go do things!
Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
Be happy, it drives people crazy.
A conclusion is a place where you got tired of thinking.
Every day brings an opportunity to do something legendary.
Don’t worry about those who talk behind your back, they’re behind you for a reason.
Caring too much about what people think of you is useless. Most people don’t even know what they think of themselves.
Be yourself, there’s no one better.
A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it. A dumb person creates it.
Be the person you needed when you were young.
5’2 but my attitude 6’1.
You only live once.
Write what you want, say what you want about me, if you’re wondering, know that I’m not sorry.
My professor is like Oprah Winfrey, she throws homeworks at us like it’s a car.
Never let anyone treat you like you’re ordinary.
Know yourself, know your worth.
Being happy never goes out of style.
Be more of you and less of them.

“You can never be overdressed or overeducated.” — Oscar Wilde
Studying means 10% reading and 90% complaining to your friends that you have to study.
I love school minus the whole school part.
“We don’t stop going to school when we graduate.” – Carol Burnett
College life hack-take a break between study sessions. Go out. Leave the country and never come back.

Saved by the bell.

I’d rather go through 7 levels of purgatory than do a class presentation.

Most likely to be caught sleeping in class.

If sleep is important, why does school start so early?
For me, math class is like watching a foreign movie without subtitles.

All the trees are losing their leaves, and not one of them is worried.
“There is a purpose in your season of waiting.” — Megan Smalley
Watch more sunsets than Netflix.
I know I am but summer to your heart, and not the full four seasons of the year.

Springtime is a time for a new adventure.
Watch more sunsets than Netflix.
The sky isn’t always blue. The sun doesn’t always shine. So it’s okay to fall apart sometimes.
Walking in a winter wonderland.
The rose and the thorn, and sorrow and gladness are linked together.
We create our own sunshine.
Sometimes you have to know when to stop hoping.
You don’t have to hibernate this winter.
Women are like stars; there may be millions of them but only one can make your dreams come true.
Some days you just have to create your own sunshine.
When the sun goes down, that’s when you see me glow.
See you at the next wave bestie.
Paradise doesn’t have to be tropical.
My relation with you is not like rain, which comes and goes away, my relation is like air, sometimes silent but always around you.
Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air, and you.
It’s cold, let’s cuddle.
Flowers grow back even when they are stepped on.
Enjoy at least one sunset per day! – Modern Family
Good times and tan lines.

My night has become a sunny dawn because of you.

Create your own sunshine.

Best in snow.

Selfie in paradise.

You make every other girl feel so inferior.

The only person I dress to impress is me.

“We do not remember days, we remember moments.” – Cesare Pavese
“There is a place you can touch a woman that will drive her crazy. Her heart.” – Melanie Griffith
“Life is a great big canvas, and you should throw all the paint you can on It.” – Danny Kaye
“He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.” – Ralph Waldo Emerson
“To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.” – Oscar Wilde
“Whatever you are, be a good one.” – Abraham Lincoln
“The only rule is don’t be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.” – Paris Hilton
“It is our choices, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.” -J. K Rowling
“In the arena of human life, the honors and rewards fall to those who show their good qualities in action.” – Aristotle
“Live life to the fullest.” – Ernest Hemingway
“When I dare to be powerful – to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.” – Audre Lorde
“It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.” – Theodore Roosevelt
“It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.” – Leonardo Da Vinci
“I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.” – Helen Keller
“Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.” – Mother Theresa
“In the book of life, the answers aren’t in the back.” – Charlie Brown
“Where there is love there is life.” – Indira Gandhi
“Some people are worth melting for.” – Frozen
“Be a little more you, and a lot less them.” – Madalyn Beck
“You are my summer breeze, my winter sun.” – Britney Spears
Piglet: “How do you spell ‘love’?” Pooh: “You don’t spell it…you feel it.” – Winnie the Pooh
“The only thing more beautiful than the woman that knows what she wants I the woman who isn’t waiting on anybody else to get it for her.” – Rob Hill Sr
“A wise girl knows her limits, a smart girl knows that she has none.” – Marilyn Monroe
“You’re braver than you believe and stronger and smarter than you think.” – Winnie the Pooh
